name: Irvb api
body:
### IRVB/BISHL API
This is a webservice to get content (schedule, game and standings informations) in a RESTful manner from [bishl.de](http://www.bishl.de), the webpage of all Inline-Skaterhockey leagues organised by [Inline- und Rollsportverband Berlin Sportkommission Inline-Skaterhockey] (http://www.rollsportverband.de/contenido/cms/front_content.php?idart=99&idcat=81&lang=1) . 

Currently supported by the API:

* schedule for season,league,year and team
* standings for season, league, year and team
* next game for a given team
* last game for a given team

The API was developed by Daniel Schmidt(@dsci) and is hosted at [Heroku](http://www.heroku.com). 

The endpoint url is: 

```
http://bishl.heroku.com/v1/
```

(Add all urls below to this endpoint url.)

## Documentation

### Getting games

List games of a league for a specific team at a specific year:

```
GET /games/league/:league/team/:team/season/:year
```

**Example**

```
curl -i -H "Accept: application/json" http://bishl.heroku.com/v1/games/league/LLA/team/74/season/2012
```

**Response**

*Status: 200 OK*

```json
{"games":[
   {"startdate":"2012-04-22T18:00:00-07:00",
    "hometeam":"Pleiszegeier Leipzig",
    "awayteam":"Powerkrauts Berlin",
    "gameid":1423,
    "stadium":"Mehrzweckhalle Taucha",
    "goalshome":"",
    "goalsaway":"",
    "overtime":0,
    "shootout":0,
    "awayteamid":4,
    "hometeamid":74
   }
  ]
}
```

(Note: Response output is abridged. "games" is an array of game definitions.)

---

```
GET /games/team/:id/league/:league_id/next
```

**Example**

```
curl -i -H "Accept: application/json" http://bishl.heroku.com/v1/games/team/74/league/LLA/next
```

**Response**

*Status: 200 OK*

```json
{"games":
  [
    {"startdate":"2012-04-22T18:00:00-07:00",
     "hometeam":"Pleiszegeier Leipzig",
     "awayteam":"Powerkrauts Berlin",

     "stadium":"Mehrzweckhalle Taucha",
     "goalshome":"",
     "goalsaway":"",
     "overtime":0,
     "shootout":0,
     "awayteamid":4,
     "hometeamid":74
    }
  ]
}
```

### Standings

List standings for a specific league at a year:

```
GET /standings/league/:league_id/season/:year
```

**Example**

```
curl -i -H "Accept: application/json" http://bishl.heroku.com/v1/standings/league/LLA/season/2011
```

**Response**

*Status: 200 OK*

```json

  [
   {"position":1,"team":
     {"teamname":"Powerkrauts Berlin",
      "wins":19,
      "losses":1,
```

---

### Teams

Get the logo of a team:

```
GET /teams/logo/:id
```

**Example**

```
curl -i -H "Accept: application/json" http://bishl.heroku.com/v1/standings/league/LLA/season/2011
```

**Response**

*Status 200 OK*

```json
{"logo":"http://www.bishl.de/img/logo/club15.png"}
```

### Examples

Get the standings of Landesliga A in 2011. This example uses [Node.js](http://nodejs.org/) and [CoffeeScript](http://coffeescript.org).

```coffeescript
http = require 'http'

options =
  host: 'bishl.heroku.com'
  path:"/v1/standings/league/LLA/year/2011"

http.get options, (res) ->
    data = ''
    res.on 'data', (chunk) ->
        data += chunk.toString()
    res.on 'end', () ->
        console.log data
        jsonified = JSON.parse(data)
        # do anything with data
```

### Authors and Contributors

As mentioned above:
Written in 2012 Daniel Schmidt (@dsci). 

It uses the [BISHL gem](https://github.com/dsci/bishl) which was also written in 2011 by Daniel Schmidt (@dsci).

Original XML interface which is used by [BISHL gem](https://github.com/dsci/bishl) and a part of [bishl.de](http://www.bishl.de) was written by Marian Strüby (as far as I know). 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the API? Do not hesitate to open an issue at the [Issue Tracker](https://github.com/dsci/irvb_api/issues).
